mapper.select: SELECT c.`id`, c.`status`, c.`seriesName`, c.`artist`, c.`rarity`, c.`image`, c.`type`, c.`createdAt`, c.`updatedAt` FROM `collectable` AS c JOIN `collectables_user` AS cu ON cu.`collectableId` = c.`id` WHERE cu.`userId` = #{userId} AND c.`type` = 1 UNION SELECT c.`id`, c.`status`, c.`seriesName`, c.`artist`, c.`rarity`, c.`image`, c.`type`, c.`createdAt`, c.`updatedAt` FROM `collectable` AS c WHERE c.`isDefault` = 1
